Ingredients.1: 1 (7.25 ounce) package macaroni and cheese mix

Ingredients.2: 0.25 cup butter, cut into small pieces

Ingredients.4: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.5: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook boxed macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.

Directions.2: Drain macaroni and return to the pot. Add butter, milk, and cheese sauce package; mix until well combined. Stir in condensed soup, tuna, corn, peas, celery, and onion. Transfer to a microwave-safe casserole dish. Level the mixture out and spread crushed crackers on top.

Directions.3: Microwave on high until the edges are bubbling, 7 to 10 minutes.
